definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun used as a given name or surname, primarily in English-speaking countries. It has historical roots in Old French and may derive from a place name or occupational term.
definitions.explanation_cn: 用作人名（名或姓）的专有名词，主要在英语国家使用，源自古法语，可能来源于地名或职业称谓。
definitions.example_en: Lyle Stevenson is the author of several acclaimed novels on rural life.
definitions.example_cn: 莱尔·史蒂文森是几位备受赞誉的乡村生活小说的作者。
